name: Elements Consulting Services/ We are Elements
description: Elements is a trusted talent resource for brands across the globe. We help companies achieve their hiring missions so that they can develop their business – fast. As a pioneer of Embedded Talent Consulting, we will act as a member of your internal resourcing or HR department. Our carefully selected team will work with you to plan, design, build and implement innovative new talent solutions that make a lasting impact.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Embedding the Future of Talent Consultancy
ShortDescription: We work with high-growth clients, filling the hiring gaps that arise from large scale growth.

Highlights.name: People
Highlights.description: Based across the globe and committed to making a real impact, our team of talent acquisition specialists are resilient, adaptable and trained to tackle the most challenging hiring briefs.

Highlights.name: Partnerships
Highlights.description: By embedding ourselves physically within our partners’ teams, we have nurtured fruitful, long-term relationships with clients within the creative and tech industries, working closely with retailers, global brands and corporates to foster growth.

Highlights.name: Methodology
Highlights.description: We work in a way that is personalised to your business, and we’ll take the time to understand your challenges from within, whether that means finding and engaging top talent, or redesigning and streamlining your headhunting processes.

enhanced_description: Elements is a global and trusted talent resource specializing in Embedded Talent Consulting. They assist brands across the globe in achieving their hiring missions and accelerating business growth by acting as an integral part of their internal resourcing or HR department. Their meticulously selected team works collaboratively with clients to plan, design, build, and implement innovative, customized talent solutions that deliver a lasting impact. Elements particularly serves high-growth clients, addressing the complex hiring gaps that emerge during periods of large-scale expansion. Their methodology is personalized to each business, focusing on understanding internal challenges, finding and engaging top talent, and redesigning or streamlining headhunting processes. They have established fruitful, long-term partnerships with clients across creative and tech industries, retailers, global brands, and corporates, leveraging a global team of resilient and adaptable talent acquisition specialists.
key_use_cases: Planning, designing, building, and implementing new talent solutions
Filling hiring gaps during large-scale growth
Developing business rapidly through efficient hiring
competitive_advantages: Acts as an integral part of internal resourcing/HR department
Customized and personalized approach to talent solutions
Team of resilient, adaptable, and highly trained talent acquisition specialists
Deep physical embedding within partner teams for long-term relationships
Expertise in addressing hiring challenges for high-growth companies
Global presence and service delivery capabilities
implementation_scenarios: Embedded within internal HR/resourcing departments as an extension of the team
roi_benefits: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Achieve hiring missions to foster business development and growth
Create lasting impact with innovative talent solutions
scalability_features: Designed to fill hiring gaps for large-scale growth
Global team enables worldwide service delivery
Resilient and adaptable approach to tackle challenging hiring briefs
